mean_en: based on general ideas and not on any particular real person, thing or situation; (of art) not representing people or things in a realistic way, but expressing the artist’s ideas about them; existing in thought or as an idea but not having a physical reality
sentence: Abstract art is often difficult to understand.
sentence_trans: 抽象艺术通常让人难以理解。
word_etyma: abs向外 + tract拉 → abstract提取，抽象
